metadata.description: A stranded alien seeks refuge in the small town of Patience, USA, where he hides undercover as a retired doctor. All the alien wants is to be left alone until he's rescued. However, when the town's real doctor dies, "Dr. Harry" is pulled into medical service,and finds himself smack dab in the middle of a murder mystery! Collects issues #0-#3 of the miniseries.
metadata.name: Resident Alien
